entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:52 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 01:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -28.6°C
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -31.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
